Subject: Re: Cliffjumper, Torca, Klant, etc (Re: Im Back)

From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Firedrill was suprised that the Seeker was awake, and he shook a bit.
"Whoa, sorry." he said. "That line, it came from the late great Optimus
Prime, a Legend to all Autobots. I've heard great stories about him, but
never met him. Cliffjumper and Beachcomber tell me a lot about him, they
both served under him, and they both have a lot of respect for his
memory." CLiffjumper than thought back. "He used to say that almost as a
war cry, when they roared on to stop the Decepticons."
